most_active_tickets.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces

common_issues.title: Users unable to connect to authentication site during Pieces install
common_issues.description: Users on Windows and MacOS are encountering authentication errors during Pieces installation, potentially due to security software like Cortex XDR blocking connections.  The error manifests as an UnauthenticatedUserException and redirects to an authentication error URL.  Users may need to configure their security software or firewalls to allow Pieces to connect.

related_issues.title: Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
related_issues.text:
Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I end up at this url:

https://pieces.app/authentication-error?sentry_id=00000000000000000000000000000000&os=917d9227-e6ca-45d6-ae1a-c6b76b70a5c1&platform=windows

Please note:  This is when I install Pieces as part of the UltraEdit 2025.0 install on my work VDI.
Our VDIs have Cortex XDR for security so this may be blocking it.  If so, I probably can't use Pieces at work.  I highly doubt they will open any ports for this.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
related_issues.text:

Additional Device Information: {cpu_list: [{"architecture":"arm64","cores":8,"logicalProcessors":8,"l1Cache":{"value":65536,"units":"Bytes"},"l2Cache":{"value":4194304,"units":"Bytes"},"description":"Apple M2"}], gpu_list: [{"type":null,"unifiedMemoryArchitecture":true,"cores":10,"dedicatedVRam":null}], memory_info: {"totalRAM":{"value":17179869184,"units":"Bytes"}}, display_list: [{"nativeHeight":1600,"nativeWidth":2560,"scaledHeight":900,"scaledWidth":1440,"primary":true}, {"nativeHeight":1440,"nativeWidth":3440,"scaledHeight":1440,"scaledWidth":3440,"primary":false}]}

Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and resolve the authentication issue during Pieces installation, focusing on compatibility with security software like Cortex XDR.
Prioritize support for Windows and MacOS users experiencing the authentication issue.
Improve documentation or in-app guidance regarding configuration of security software for Pieces installation.
Consider adding diagnostics to the Pieces installer to identify and troubleshoot connection issues.
